api_list.name: Single IP Lookup
api_list.description:
You can call the API by sending HTTP GET requests to [IP address]

[IP address] can be an IPv4 or IPv6 address, or none to use the current IP address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ipwhois.p.rapidapi.com/8.8.4.4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipwhois.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ipwhois.p.rapidapi.com/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipwhois.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
